response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and craftsmanship. Given its unique features and unparalleled performance, we believe its true value far exceeds $1,000,000. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is your chance to own a piece of excellence that could potentially be a valuable asset in the future. We look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss the details further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
